New Records: Iftikhar Ahmed and Shadab Khan each scored half-centuries, contributing to Pakistan's recovery
Key Match Events: Pakistan's top-order collapse followed by recovery through partnerships; rain interruption leading to a revised target
Post-Match Reflections: The victory kept Pakistan's tournament hopes alive; South Africa's defeat ended their unbeaten record
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays and Duckworth-Lewis method adjustments affected the match flow; Proteas' standing in the group
